name: NertWorks Super Mega Popup
author: Codebangers

sections.description:
Super Mega Popup makes it easy to place popups on a particular page, post or site wide. Offers different options for user to select to customize their popup. Newly added. Popups can be edited just like a WordPress Post.

A brief Markdown

Ordered list:

  1. Single Page Usage
  2. Site Wide Usage
  3. Customizable popup message
  4. Supports Colorbox
  5. Support Multi Site
  6. Supports Images/Videos in Popups
  7. Support Multiple Colorbox Styles
sections.installation:
1. Upload nertworks-super-mega-popup/ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is this an awesome plugin that will make popups for me?

Yes, these things are true.

Does it support Colorbox?

Yes, yes it does.

Do you like Star Wars?

Yes. Yes I do.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Popups can be placed on all pages or just individual ones.
  • Popup Message is customizable.

1.01

  • Additional Options/Settings
    *Added Colorbox

2.0

*Added options for logged in and not logged in users.
*Added Shortcode function
*Added Multi Site support
*Added WYSIWYG
*Added Cookie Support
*Added Colorbox Style Choices
*Supports Images/Videos in Popups
=2.03=
*Improved WYSIWYG
*Switched Colorbox to use iframes so popups can be fully customizable.
*Users can adjust the size of popups
=2.12=
*Went back to using colobox html instead of iframe for many reasons.
*Added custom post type popups. Now you can have more popups to choose from.
